subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Micheal Ray Richardson was a gifted athlete who snorted away his N.B.A. career. Now his C.B.A. coaching career has been derailed after making insensitive comments to a fan.
snippet: Micheal Ray Richardson was a gifted athlete who snorted away his N.B.A. career. Now his C.B.A. coaching career has been derailed after making insensitive comments to a fan.
